channel.title: GitHub Trending - Ruby (Weekly)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in Ruby nel periodo weekly

item.title: 📝 docusealco/rllama (58 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: docusealco

📝 Repository: docusealco/rllama

📄 Descrizione: Ruby FFI bindings for llama.cpp to run open-source LLMs such as GPT-OSS, Qwen 3, Gemma 3, and Llama 3 locally with Ruby code.

⭐ Stelle: 58

🍴 Forks: 3

💻 Linguaggio: Ruby

🏷️ Topics: ai embeddings ffi gguf inference llamacpp llm ruby

📜 Licenza: No license

⏰ Creato il: 2025-10-05T08:02:20Z

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-10-10T00:42:32Z

Visita il Repository su GitHub

]]>
